DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate pharmacokinetics single multiple dos Qing ' E pill Chinese menopause volunteer . The main component Qing ' E pill blood psoralen Isopsoralen detect .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 40 60 Years , Suffering irregular menstrual cycle amenorrhea 311 month . 2 . Moderate severe hot flash ( associate sweating ) ≥5 time /24 hour . 3 . The score Kupperman index less 15 . 4 . Patients unused estrogen tablet progesterone injection 6 month . 5 . Patients must discontinue therapy treatment menopausal syndrome 3 month . 6 . Get subject informed consent process comply GCP requirement . 1 . There clinical significance abnormal physical laboratory examination . 2 . Bilateral oophorectomy , endometrial lesion , uterine polyp , abnormal vaginal bleeding , severe breast hyperplasia , family history breast cancer . 3 . Patients hypertension , primary hypotension chronic anemia ( Hb ≤ 90 g/L ) . 4 . Patients hyperthyroidism , coronary atheroma , diabetes , obesity ( body mass index 30 kg/m2 ) , migraine , malignant tumor , thromboembolic disease , gastrointestinal disease affect absorption autoimmune disease . 5 . Patients diseases cardiovascular , cerebrovascular , liver , kidney hematopoietic system , mentally ill. 6 . People allergy . 7 . People take drug within 14 day trail . 8 . Patients participate clinical trial within 3 month . 9 . Pregnant Women . 10 . Alcoholics smoker ( past smoking ) .
